vendor_name: Leisure Inn Spires Resort Pty Limited
title: NSW Picturesque Leura Retreat within UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Blue Mountains
description: Discover the best of New South Wales’ iconic Blue Mountains region with a stay at Leisure Inn Spires. Perfectly positioned in the picturesque township of Leura - just a 90-minute drive from bustling Sydney - and surrounded by gentle garden slopes, there’s no better place to explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed region’s world-famous attractions, including the Three Sisters, Wentworth Falls and some of Australia’s best bushwalking trails. Return from adventures abroad to Leura’s stunning, cherry tree-lined town centre, historic Art Deco houses and sublime gardens.
offer_address: 118-124 Leura Mall, Leura, New South Wales 2780, Australia

title: Heritage Blue Mountains Retreat near Katoomba with Daily Breakfast & Parking
description:
Experience the Blue Mountains from this retreat set among manicured gardens. A short walk from central Leura Village, you’ll find boutique shops, cafes and dining in a quiet, tree-lined area. The hotel grounds offer a peaceful place to unwind, surrounded by native plants and wildlife.

Beyond the gardens, explore natural landmarks just minutes away. Visit Wentworth Falls, Gordon Falls Lookout or Echo Point in Katoomba to see the Three Sisters rock formation. With walking tracks and cultural sites nearby, Leura Gardens Resort is well-positioned for discovering the region.
offer_address: 20-28 Fitzroy Street, Leura, New South Wales 2780, Australia

vendor_name: Leisure Inn Spires Resort Pty Limited
title: Blue Mountains Picturesque Apartment-Style Retreat with Welcome Wine & Guaranteed Late Checkout
description:
Savour the charms of New South Wales' iconic Blue Mountains with a stay at this laidback apartment-style sanctuary, ideally positioned in the picturesque township of Leura, a mere 90-minute drive - or just under two hours by train - from Sydney.

Nestled amid gently sloped landscaped gardens, you'll easily be able to explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed region's world-famous attractions, including Three Sisters, Wentworth Falls and some of Australia's best bushwalking trails. Return from adventures abroad to Leura’s stunning, cherry tree-lined town centre, historic Art Deco houses, cafes and sublime gardens.
offer_address: 118-124 Leura Mall, Leura, New South Wales 2780, Australia

vendor_name: Leisure Inn Spires Resort Pty Limited
title: Picturesque Leura Retreat within UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Blue Mountains
description:
Experience the breathtaking beauty of New South Wales' iconic Blue Mountains with a stay at Leisure Inn Spires. Ideally located in the charming township of Leura - just a 90-minute drive from vibrant Sydney - this tranquil retreat is surrounded by lush garden slopes.

Immerse yourself in the wonders of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed region, home to the renowned Three Sisters, Wentworth Falls and some of Australia’s finest bushwalking trails. After a day of exploration, return to Leura’s enchanting town centre, lined with cherry trees, historic Art Deco homes and exquisite gardens.
offer_address: 118-124 Leura Mall, Leura, New South Wales 2780, Australia

vendor_name: Fairmont Resort & Spa Blue Mountains - MGallery by Sofitel
title: Blue Mountains Boutique MGallery Retreat with Two Pools & Whiskey Tavern
description:
Escape to the eucalyptus-clad hills and sandstone lookouts of the UNESCO-listed Blue Mountains National Park. Just 90 minutes from Sydney, this serene retreat offers two pools, exceptional dining options, and a hidden whiskey tavern.

Enjoy winter fun at the 600-square-meter indoor ice skating rink, or tee off at the historic Leura Golf Club. For ultimate relaxation, indulge in treatments at the world-class Ubika Day Spa. Plus, the resort's gardens offer breathtaking views of the ancient mountains and plateaus.
offer_address: 1 Sublime Point Road, Leura, New South Wales 2780, Australia
